EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Lisa (1323889620.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultant Services Email 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Lisa,
Youre welcome and well definitely be around if the situation makes sense to revisit us. We will have some upcoming webinars in the next few months with some really top notch speakers  well be sure to send you an email with a full list of all webinars for the year.
Lastly, thank you for the compliment  we have definitely been growing like crazy. Weve nearly quadrupled in size in the past few years!
Regards,
Steve
From: Lisa Spivey [mailto:lisa@spiveyinternational.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 11:51 AM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Lisa
Thanks, Steve.
I have a full consulting client base right now and have two accountants on staff as well. I think I am set for the time being. I have made a note to myself to re-visit this in Q1.
Looks like you have made good progress, and I appreciate you keeping me updated.
Best regards,
-Lisa
From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 8:42 AM To: lisa@spiveyinternational.com Subject: MBO Partners / Lisa
Dear Lisa,
I noticed that you recently visited our website! We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steven ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
